title: The Good Guys Is Having A Massive Online Sale Tonight
text:
Image: Supplied

The Good Guys is throwing a huge clearance sale across a stack of categories including TVs, fridges, range hoods, air conditioners, computers and more. You can score up to 25% off already discounted items with free delivery on select products. Here are the highlights!

The Goof Guys VIP sale ends at 9pm tonight. Instead of elbowing through the crowds in store, the smart way to bag a bargain is via the Good Guys' online deals portal. Here are a few deals that caught our our eye. (Note: some deals require a discount code - we have indicated which products below.)

Grab an extra 10% off: In addition to specific deals, The Good Guys is knocking 10 per cent off hundreds of online products when you use the discount code 'NIGHT10'. Click here to start browsing! 15% off Selected TCL TVs: Prices start at under $850! To get the deal, use the discount code 'TCL15' at checkout. You can also get $300 cashback on select Sony TVs. Click here! Laptop & Tablet clearance: Prices start at just $179! Click here. 20% off Air Cons: Includes split system air conditioners, portable fans, reverse cycle aircons and the latest in multi-system cooling from Fujitsu, Dyson, Kelvinator, Panasonic, Delonghi and more. Click here! 20% off Fridges: Get an extra 20% off select Bar Fridges, French Door Fridges and Top Mount Fridges in a range of sizes. Participating brands include Fisher & Paykel, LG, Samsung and Westinghouse. Click here! 10% off Apple MacBook Pro 13 (2019 model): Choose between the 256G and 128GB version. Click here! Extra 15% off Weber Outdoor Cooking: Includes traditional Webers, electric BBQs, grills and Weber cooking accessories. To get the full discount, use the code 'WEB15' at checkout. Click here! 20% of Microsoft Surface Pro 6: Intel Core i5, 128GB SSD and 8GB RAM for $1119. Click here! 15% off Ovens and Rangehoods: Score the aforementioned discount on ovens, induction cookers, rangehoods and cooktops from leading brands including Bosch, Smeg, Electrolux, Fisher & Paykel and LG. Click here! Cheap smartphones: Most of last year's flagship models from Samsung, Apple and Motorola are included in the sale with prices starting at $199. Click here! 15% off Lenovo PC Desktops and Laptop: Over 30 models to choose from, including 2-in-1 laptops, notebooks and traditional desktop computers. Click here!

As mentioned, you only have until 9pm tonight to grab the above deals. Click here to see the full sale.

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: The Good Guys is throwing a huge clearance sale across a stack of categories including TVs, fridges, range hoods, air conditioners, computers and more. You can score up to 25% off already discounted items with free delivery on select products. Here are the highlights!...
